git.report: cd "{{{workspace}}}{{{pathseparator}}}{{{name}}}" && printf "Branch     : " && (git symbolic-ref --short --quiet HEAD) && printf "Uncommitted: " && ((git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- && echo "Clean") || echo "Dirty") && printf "Unpushed   : " && (git log --branches --not --remotes --oneline | wc -l)

svn.report: cd "{{{workspace}}}{{{pathseparator}}}{{{name}}}" && printf "Branch     : " && (svn info | grep '^URL:' | egrep -o '(tags|branches)/[^/]+|trunk' | egrep -o '[^/]+$') && printf "Uncommitted: " && (((svn status -q | grep --quiet [AMCDG]) && echo Dirty) || echo Clean)
